'''Adepti Sigil''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing the {{Quest|Bygones Times Like Dust Passing}}.

==Trivia==
*It bears the same symbols as the seals gating the entrances to Adepti abodes in [[Jueyun Karst]].
